## ScrollViewProperty class

ScrollView的属性  module:ui

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export class ScrollViewProperty 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [direction](./extractor.scrollviewproperty.direction.md) |  | number | ScrollDirection组合，表示支持滑动的方向  { number } |
|  [fadeout](./extractor.scrollviewproperty.fadeout.md) |  | [Sides3D](./extractor.sides3d.md) | 各方向超出ScrollView范围时的渐隐距离,默认值为 (1, 1,1, 1, 1, 1)  { module:ui.Sides3D } |
|  [loop](./extractor.scrollviewproperty.loop.md) |  | number | ScrollDirection组合，表示支持循环的方向，默认值为 none  { number } |
|  [scrollPos](./extractor.scrollviewproperty.scrollpos.md) |  | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 各方向的滑动位置,默认值为 (0, 0, 0)  { module:Common.Vector3f } |
|  [size](./extractor.scrollviewproperty.size.md) |  | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | ScrollView的大小，默认值为 (1, 1, 1)  { module:Common.Vector3f } |
